channel.title: Comments for page "Till the End"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Till the End"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I am mad at whoever wrote the comment. Compare Till the End to Fathers Know Best. you get 1 strength in genjutsu and 2 levels in genjutsu in exchange for 2 Tai/Nin Levels and 1 Tai/Nin Strength. Overall it is nearly as good and easier to obtain because you only need to find 1 Ally in A-rank missions instead of 3 and therefore probably get these guys first.
